Time-series cross-section summaries in R xtsum2 returns three datasets for cross-sectional time series tsibble.

xtsum2.Rd

Time-series cross-section summaries in R xtsum2 returns three datasets for cross-sectional time series tsibble.

xtsum2(data, key.var)

Arguments

data

A tibble with clean time and unit(key) indices.
key.var

The unit/(key) index.

Value

a list containing three named elements: Between, Within, and Combined.

Examples

data(FANG)
xtsum2(FANG, key.var=symbol)

#> Joining, by = c("symbol", "open", "high", "low", "close", "volume", "adjusted")
#> Joining, by = "symbol"
